     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19673389">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19673389">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19673389">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19673389">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.ed
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19673389" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19673390">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19673390">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19673390">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19673390">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19673390" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19673391">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19673391">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19673391">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works (good for topic-generating and recommending sources)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19673391">
          <div id="boxatt19673391" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22996998">
              <a id="link_22996998" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22996998,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. Contains several hundred academic-audience reference works.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23000142">
              <a id="link_23000142" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=LCO" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23000142,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19978676}); ">
               Literature Criticism Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Literary biography and criticism.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23004542">
              <a id="link_23004542" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23004542,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21655066}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Not an authoritative source per se. Bibliography may link to web interviews.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19673392">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19673392">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19673392">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly books and primary documents
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19673392">
          <div id="boxatt19673392" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22997004">
              <a id="link_22997004" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22997004,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22997005">
              <a id="link_22997005" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22997005,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a rich source of full-text documents (books and other materials) published prior to 1923 that are now in the public domain.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22997003">
              <a id="link_22997003" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22997003,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Catalog of books and documents in libraries throughout the world. Watch especially for the AREA LIBRARIES designation.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19673393">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19673393">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19673393">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly journal articles, other reputable periodicals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19673393">
          <div id="boxatt19673393" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22997006">
              <a id="link_22997006" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22997006,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               A library subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22997008">
              <a id="link_22997008" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22997008,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A library subscription database. Standard index for North American history. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22997010">
              <a id="link_22997010" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=f3h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22997010,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19008881}); ">
               Film and Television Literature Index with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals, trade journals, books, and more in the areas of television and film.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22997009">
              <a id="link_22997009" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22997009,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23005646">
              <a id="link_23005646" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23005646,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing, abstracts, and selected full text of articles appearing in history journals, with emphasis on world history from 1450 to present (excluding the U.S. and Canada which are covered in America: History and Life). It includes citations to books, journal articles, and dissertations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22997007">
              <a id="link_22997007" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22997007,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A library subscription database. Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22997118">
              <a id="link_22997118" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=LCO" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22997118,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717125}); ">
               Literature Criticism Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               All full text, this extensive archive of criticism of 20th century literary works comes from scholarly journals and books.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22997011">
              <a id="link_22997011" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22997011,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456735}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19673394">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19673394">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19673394">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search engines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19673394">
          <div id="boxatt19673394" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22997015">
              <a id="link_22997015" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22997015,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19978738}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Authoritativeness will vary. Assess author and institutional affiliation.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5275457" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19673395">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19673395">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19673395">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources and compiling an annotated bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19673395">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19673395" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19673396">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19673396">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19673396">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19673396">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19673396" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
